title.rendered: Old House Journal Selects Eldorado Stone as a Top Product

content.rendered: The editors of Old House Journal selected Eldorado Stone as one the top products to make old house project easier. The article states that Eldorado Stone recently added a slew of new colors to its current broad offering of architectural stone and its stone veneers can make installation easier while fulfilling historical style requirements.
